p: Evaluation of potential phytotoxic effect of EO was evaluated on seeds of four species. There were chosen three dicotyledonous species as Raphanus sativus L. (radish), Lepidium sativum L. (garden cress) and Lactuca sativa L. (lettuce) and one monocotyledonous species Triticum aestivum L. (common wheat) as a model plants. R. sativus L. var. radicula Pers. (cv. ’Duo’), L. sativum L. (cv. ’Dánska’), and L. sativa (cv. Král Máje I.) seeds were purchased from Zel Seed (Slovakia). Common wheat was obtained from the Research Center in Malý Šariš.
